description: With this skill, you can ask Alexa to give you a random move to play the Twister game. No more need to have someone to spin the wheel to get a random move. As you know the classic Twister game has 4 colors. Someone need to spinner the wheel to play the game. With this skill, all can play the game at the same time.
exampleInteractions: Alexa Ask twist helper to give me a move
Alexa Ask twist helper to get a move
Alexa Ask twist helper to bring it on
name: Twist Helper
shortDescription: With this skill, you can ask Alexa to give you a random move to play the Twister game. No more need to have someone to spin the wheel to get a random move.
